Name: Amanda Craig
Job/Team Function: The Operations Directorate comprises of 14 Area Teams who work with customers and partners to deliver Natural England’s Strategic Direction and statutory responsibilities at local level.  The Director is accountable for the 7 Northern Area Teams, which are Northumbria Area Team, Cumbria Area Team, Yorkshire & North Lincolnshire Area Team, Cheshire to Lancashire Area Team, East Midlands Area Team, North Mercia Area Team, and South Mercia Area Team.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: John Holmes
Job/Team Function: The Operations Directorate comprises of 14 Area Teams who work with customers and partners to deliver Natural England’s Strategic Direction and statutory responsibilities at local level.  The Director is accountable for the 7 Southern Area Teams which are Essex, Herts, Beds, Cambs, Northants Area Team, Norfolk, Suffolk Area Team, Thames Valley Area Team, Somerset, Avon, Wiltshire Area Team, Devon, Cornwall, Isles of Scilly Area Team, Dorset, Hampshire, Isle of Wight Area Team and Sussex and Kent Area Team.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
